dt: {bc}the boundary layer between the earth's crust and mantle whose depth varies from about 3 miles (5 kilometers) beneath the ocean floor to about 25 miles (40 kilometers) beneath the continents

et: short for {it}Mohorovicic discontinuity{/it}, from Andrija {it}Mohorovičić{/it} †1936 Yugoslavian geologist
shortdef: the boundary layer between the earth's crust and mantle whose depth varies from about 3 miles (5 kilometers) beneath the ocean floor to about 25 miles (40 kilometers) beneath the continents
